name: AT-One EEIG
memberOrga:
DLR JV GmbH(1),
NLR deelnemingen BV(1)
goal:
AT-One – the European ATM Research Alliance

The AT-One EEIG is formed by the German Aerospace Center (DLR) and the Netherlands Aerospace Centre (NLR), two of the largest European aerospace research and development organizations. DLR and NLR deliver innovative and independent Air Traffic Management research and implementation support with a focus on integrated simulation, verification and validation.
interests: International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives: Horizon 2020, SESAR, SESAR2020, Clean Sky, Clean Sky 2, Horizon Europe, SESAR 3, Clean Sky 3
